snippet.title: Just Crow Things - Official Announcement Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
Watch the announcement trailer for Just Crow Things to see a mischievous, adorable crow steal shiny things and cause chaos in this upcoming sandbox adventure game.


In Just Crow Things, you play as a cute crow, fly around town, poop on people, and steal their shiny trinkets. In this sandbox-y adventure game, help your animal friends create adorable chaos and have a beak-tastic time customizing your adorable crow appearance! Why? Just caws!


Just Crow Things will be coming to PC, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PlayStation.
